(OOC: Sorry can't remember it's name, and I've deleted my mail recently)

::Magmatron::

    "Alert Commander Magmatron," The ships computer voice said. "A ship has 
been discovered in the oceans. It has transwarp capabilities."
    Magmatron took this news in stride, this could be very good for him. "If 
the Destrocons do not wish to join me then I will return to my plans. All 
door open. Close main doors and autoguns online"
    Everything happened as it should. Magmatron went back to his command 
room. He sat looking at the blip on the radar screen. "Send a probe." He 
commanded the ship. From the entrance the small probe went in search of the 
ship, as it came near the cameras turned on.
    "Well, what have we here? An attack would be pointless against a ship 
that large, but if I can get inside....Maybe I'll equip Mantella and Shredder 
with cloaking devices, and let them have some extras, just in case. Yes, that 
would work."


Somewhat on topic: Magmatron has a plan for the ship. Wondering what it is? 
Stay tuned, same bat time, same bat channel.
